title: How Much You Should Charge for Brand Deals | Ian from Seatgeek
description: Ian Borthwick, famously known as "Ian from Seatgeek" joins Reed this week to talk about his time working on brand deals with the world's largest creators like Cody Ko and David Dobrik. For creators with audiences from a few hundred followers to millions of followers, Ian and Reed break down how they should approach sponsorships and provide key insight on negotiating these deals with brands.
dc:creator: Reed Duchscher and Blake Robbins
